oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - American Ace - 1947-12-27 - Excerpts
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Excerpts from an American Ace sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment (7:30-8:00 pm) from December 27, 1947. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), and performers Roy Acuff and his Smoky Mountain Boys, Pap's Jug Band, and Mac McGar. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Mac McGar; Pap's Jug Band; Roy Acuff; Smoky Mountain Boys
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: [Unidentified mandolin instrumental] (Mac McGar mandolin) -- [break] -- Gonna Raise A Ruckus Tonight (Pap's Jug Band) -- Roy Acuff talks -- The Titanic (Roy Acuff and his Smoky Mountain Boys) -- American Ace Coffee commercial (Grant Turner) (incomplete) -- [break] -- Turn Your Radio On (Roy Acuff and his Smoky Mountain Boys) -- Roy Acuff introduces Mac McGar -- Ida Red (Mac McGar fiddle) -- American Ace Coffee commercial (Grant Turner) (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Grand ole opry (Radio program); Acuff, Roy; Smoky Mountain Boys; McGar, Mac; Wilson, Lonnie; Pap's Jug Band; Zinkan, Joe; Turner, Grant;
